summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on July 24, 2009. The email includes a congratulatory message and requests confidential treatment from JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, reaching out to Jes Staley with a congratulatory message.

The subject of the email is a congratulatory message.
Confidential treatment was requested by JPMorgan Chase.
